channel.title: Inserters for Satisfactory - arm + belt problem
channel.description:
I had break from Satisfactory and now is problem with inserters - they recognize storages any types - vanila or modded - grabing item from transmition belts - arm can't grab any item ! Animation is on max arm lenght and nothing. Anyone have same problem?
INSERTERS ver. 0.1.2 Satisfactory EA and Experimental, all other mods updated to newest version
